title: Reverse Evolution - Novel Updates
author: 底虚
description:
What is evolution?

Is nothing more than the direction of the evolution of species selection.

“Inverse”: Inverse also …

How many legends have vanished from the ancient unknown?

This story is another human adventure seeking strength.

Every exploration and adventure of mankind has its price, and of course this time is no exception.
